servicesPage.title: EROTIC SERVICES

servicesPage.description: Discover our complete catalog of services designed to awaken all your senses and offer you transformative experiences in an environment of maximum luxury.

services.title: EXOTIC PARADISE & FANTASY
services.description: Let yourself be carried away to a world where anything is possible. Every detail is tailored to your most intimate desires and fantasies. Your pleasure has no limits in your own Fantasy Paradise.
services.fullDescription: In this exclusive massage, every detail is tailored to your most intimate desires and fantasies. If you dream of a different caress, a provocative costume, a dominant gaze, or even an experience with accessories (like blindfolds, handcuffs, shackles, soft whips, harnesses, costumes, and much more), this is your space. Here, your fantasy is the protagonist. You just have to tell us what ignites your senses... and we will make it a reality.

services.title: PREMIUM SENSUAL 4-HANDS
services.description: Exclusive striptease show with sensual pole dance. Shared erotic shower and professional four-hands erotic tantric massage.
services.fullDescription: A unique experience that includes an exclusive striptease show, sensual pole dance, a shared erotic shower with both masseuses, a professional four-hands erotic tantric massage, and moments of complicity and play on the divan. The masseuses wear fine and exclusive lingerie, chosen just for you. A session created at your pace and to your desire.

services.title: TANTRIC DELUXE
services.description: Shared erotic shower with your masseuse. Sensual body-to-body massage, front and back, with professional erotic techniques.
services.fullDescription: In your Tantric Deluxe experience, you will enjoy a shared erotic shower with your masseuse, a sensual body-to-body massage front and back, professional and seductive erotic techniques, and a double manual release (guaranteed double pleasure). The room is set with rose petals, candles, and delicate aromas. Includes a glass of champagne, wine, or beer to accompany the moment.

services.title: COUPLE'S TANTRA HARMONY
services.description: An intimate ritual designed to reconnect with your partner and awaken desire together. One or two masseuses will guide you in this shared experience.
services.fullDescription: An intimate ritual designed to reconnect with your partner and awaken desire together. One or two masseuses will guide you in a sensual body-to-body massage, where both of you will actively participate with caresses, touches, and shared games, recovering lost complicity. The session includes a hot candle wax massage on the body, a romantic atmosphere with candles and petals, and a bottle of champagne to toast as pleasure flows between you. The finale will be the most anticipated moment: a manual release for both, sealing the experience in total harmony.

services.title: YACHT MASSAGE EXPERIENCE
services.description: Immerse yourself in a luxury tantric experience designed especially for you, aboard your private yacht. A deep connection between body and desire.
services.fullDescription: Immerse yourself in a luxury tantric experience designed especially for you, aboard your private yacht. We take care of every detail: enveloping aromas, sensual music, warm oils, and an ambiance that transforms your vessel into a floating oasis of pleasure. This massage is more than a session: it is a deep connection between body and desire, guided by expert hands in an intimate and exclusive environment. Ideal for those looking to disconnect from the world and surrender to the art of pleasure with total privacy, between the sway of the sea and the magic of touch.

packages.title: DISCOUNT FOR LOYAL CLIENTS
packages.description: Loyalty deserves a reward. If you've enjoyed our massages before, this Thursday get a ‚Ç¨20 discount on your massage session. A special way to thank you for your trust and loyalty.

packages.title: SHARED PLEASURE
packages.description: Every Saturday, come with a friend... If you share the moment with a friend, you both will enjoy a 10% discount on your experience. Because pleasure... is better enjoyed together.

packages.title: SUNDAYS FOR SINNING
packages.description: Choose a four-hands massage at an exclusive price. More hands... more pleasure. An intensified experience that multiplies sensations and ecstasy. Perfect for those seeking a deeper and more enveloping experience.

faqs.question: What do the services include?
faqs.answer: All our services include a personalized consultation, climate-controlled environment, ambient music, premium oils, and hot towels. Premium services include additional amenities such as champagne, private jacuzzi, and other specified luxuries.

faqs.question: How can I make a reservation?
faqs.answer: You can book via WhatsApp, our online form, or by calling directly. We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance. For premium services, a 48-hour advance reservation is required.

faqs.question: What privacy measures do you have?
faqs.answer: We guarantee absolute discretion and privacy. Our facilities have private entrances, we do not share client information, and all our staff sign confidentiality agreements.

aboutPage.meta_description: Learn the story of Tantric Luxe Mallorca. Pioneers in luxury tantric massage since 2019. Specialized center with certified professionals, luxury facilities and over 5000 satisfied clients in Palma.

aboutPage.title: OUR STORY
aboutPage.subtitle: LUXURY TANTRIC SPA
aboutPage.description: Since 2019, we have been pioneers in creating luxury tantric experiences that transform lives and elevate consciousness in the heart of Mallorca.
aboutPage.story_title: A SANCTUARY OF LUXURY AND SENSUALITY
aboutPage.story_p1: At Tantric Luxe Mallorca, we have created more than a spa; we have developed a sanctuary where the ancestral art of tantra meets the most refined contemporary luxury. Our vision is to provide a sacred space where our guests can explore, heal, and transform.
aboutPage.story_p2: Every detail of our facilities has been meticulously designed to create an atmosphere that awakens all the senses. From essential oils imported directly from their places of origin to ambient music composed specifically for each type of experience.
aboutPage.story_p3: Our team is composed of highly trained and internationally certified professionals, committed to maintaining the highest standards of excellence, privacy, and respect in every interaction.

aboutPage.philosophy_quote: Tantra is not just a practice; it is a path to deep self-understanding and authentic connection with others. In every experience we create, we honor this ancestral wisdom while embracing the beauty of the present moment.

philosophy_points.title: AUTHENTIC CONNECTION
philosophy_points.text: We facilitate genuine encounters with yourself and others, free from judgment and full of acceptance.

philosophy_points.title: HOLISTIC HEALING
philosophy_points.text: We believe in the healing power of conscious touch and mindful presence to restore balance.

philosophy_points.title: CONSCIOUS TRANSFORMATION
philosophy_points.text: Each experience is designed to catalyze positive and lasting changes in your life.

goldenRelax.title: GOLDEN RELAX
goldenRelax.meta_title: Golden Relax Massage Palma | Deep Relaxation and Integral Wellness
goldenRelax.meta_description: Discover the Golden Relax massage in Palma de Mallorca. Integral relaxation treatment with aromatherapy and special oils. Reduce stress and renew your energy. Book now.
goldenRelax.meta_keywords: golden relax massage palma, relaxation massage mallorca, wellness treatment palma, anti-stress massage mallorca, deep relaxation palma, therapeutic massage palma, relaxation spa mallorca
goldenRelax.description: A Golden Relax massage is an integral relaxation treatment focused on releasing physical and mental tensions. It combines gentle and deep movements, aromatherapy and special oils to reduce stress and provide a feeling of well-being and deep rest. Ideal for those seeking to disconnect and renew energy.
goldenRelax.full_description: The Golden Relax massage in Palma de Mallorca is much more than a simple relaxation treatment. It is an experience designed to release all accumulated tensions in your body and mind. Our specialized techniques combine gentle and deep movements that work on tension points, while carefully selected aromatherapy and premium oils create an atmosphere of calm and serenity. This treatment is perfect for people seeking to disconnect from the fast pace of daily life, reduce accumulated stress and renew their vital energy. Each session is personalized according to your specific needs, guaranteeing a unique and transformative experience.

faqs.question: What does the Golden Relax massage include?
faqs.answer: The Golden Relax massage includes a complete 60-minute session with deep relaxation techniques, specialized aromatherapy, use of premium oils, climate-controlled environment and relaxing music. Everything designed to provide an integral wellness experience.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for people with muscle pain?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Golden Relax massage is ideal for relieving muscle pain and tension. Our gentle and deep techniques work specifically on tension areas, providing relief and relaxation.

faqs.question: Do I need to book in advance?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance to guarantee availability. However, we also accept same-day bookings subject to availability.

goldenSensitivo.title: GOLDEN SENSITIVE
goldenSensitivo.meta_title: Golden Sensitive Massage Palma | Gentle Treatment for Sensitive Skin
goldenSensitivo.meta_description: Golden Sensitive massage in Palma de Mallorca. Delicate and gentle treatment ideal for sensitive skin. Careful techniques, special oils and deep relaxation. Book your session.
goldenSensitivo.meta_keywords: golden sensitive massage palma, sensitive skin massage mallorca, delicate treatment palma, gentle massage mallorca, harmonious relaxation palma, hypoallergenic massage mallorca
goldenSensitivo.description: A Golden Sensitive massage is a soft and delicate treatment, designed for people with sensitive skin or those seeking a deep and harmonious relaxation experience. It uses slow and careful techniques, along with special oils, to provide comfort, emotional calm and a feeling of balance and total well-being.
goldenSensitivo.full_description: The Golden Sensitive massage is specially designed for those with sensitive skin or who prefer a softer and more delicate touch. Our techniques are extremely careful and slow, allowing your body to relax gradually and naturally. We use special hypoallergenic oils that nourish the skin without causing irritation. This treatment not only works at a physical level, but also provides emotional calm and mental balance, creating a feeling of total well-being. Perfect for those seeking a deep relaxation experience without the intensity of more vigorous techniques.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for very sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The Golden Sensitive massage is specifically designed for sensitive skin. We use hypoallergenic oils and extremely gentle techniques that respect your skin's sensitivity.

faqs.question: What type of oils are used?
faqs.answer: We use special high-quality hypoallergenic oils, specifically selected for sensitive skin. All our oils are natural and formulated to nourish without causing irritation.

faqs.question: How long does the session last?
faqs.answer: The complete session lasts 60 minutes, enough time to provide deep and harmonious relaxation without overloading sensitive skin.

experienciaGolden.title: GOLDEN EXPERIENCE
experienciaGolden.meta_title: Golden Experience Palma | Exclusive Body to Body Massage
experienciaGolden.meta_description: Live the Golden Experience in Palma de Mallorca. Exclusive sensory massage combining Golden Relax and Golden Sensitive. Deep connection, body to body and integral wellness. Book now.
experienciaGolden.meta_keywords: golden experience palma, body to body massage mallorca, sensory massage palma, exclusive experience mallorca, deep connection palma, intimate massage palma, sensory experience mallorca
experienciaGolden.description: The Golden Experience is an exclusive and sensory massage that integrates the best of Golden Relax and Golden Sensitive in a single session. It includes soft and enveloping techniques, special oils and aromatherapy, creating a deep state of relaxation and well-being. It is a body-to-body massage, where a very deep connection is generated and an atmosphere of complicity, allowing energies to flow and merge in a unique, harmonious and conscious experience.
experienciaGolden.full_description: The Golden Experience represents the pinnacle of our relaxation treatments in Palma de Mallorca. This exclusive experience masterfully combines the best techniques from Golden Relax and Golden Sensitive, creating a unique 90-minute session that transcends the physical to reach a level of deep and harmonious connection. The body-to-body massage allows energies to flow freely, creating an atmosphere of complicity and conscious surrender. Each movement is designed to awaken the senses, while special oils and aromatherapy create an enveloping environment that transports to a state of integral well-being. It is an experience that invites full presence, conscious enjoyment and authentic connection with oneself.

faqs.question: How does the Golden Experience differ from other massages?
faqs.answer: The Golden Experience is unique because it combines the best of two treatments in one: the deep relaxation of Golden Relax and the delicacy of Golden Sensitive. Additionally, it is a body-to-body massage that generates a very deep connection and a unique atmosphere of complicity.

faqs.question: How long does the Golden Experience last?
faqs.answer: The Golden Experience lasts 90 minutes, enough time to enjoy all the techniques and reach a deep state of relaxation and connection.

faqs.question: Do I need previous massage experience?
faqs.answer: Not necessary. The Golden Experience is designed for everyone, both for those with previous experience and for those for whom it is their first time. Our professionals adapt to your pace and needs.

goldenSuiteExperiencia.description: The Golden Suite Experience (Hotel) is an intense and deeply sensory luxury experience, created to be lived in the intimacy of a hotel suite. The exclusive environment, enveloping aromas and carefully integrated massage techniques awaken the senses and take relaxation to another level. It is an experience where connection, complicity and conscious surrender become protagonists, allowing a deep energetic fusion in an intimate and sophisticated space. Ideal for those seeking something more than a massage: a powerful experience of well-being, total disconnection and elevated sensory pleasure.
goldenSuiteExperiencia.full_description: The Golden Suite Experience represents the maximum level of exclusivity and luxury in Palma de Mallorca. This unique experience takes place in the intimacy of your hotel suite, transforming the space into a sanctuary of well-being and sensory pleasure. Every detail has been carefully designed: from the enveloping aromas that awaken the senses to the massage techniques that integrate perfectly with the exclusive environment. The connection generated is deep and authentic, creating an atmosphere of complicity where conscious surrender allows a unique energetic fusion. It is more than a massage: it is a powerful experience that combines well-being, total disconnection from the outside world and elevated sensory pleasure. Perfect for those seeking the extraordinary in an intimate and sophisticated setting.

faqs.question: How does the hotel service work?
faqs.answer: Our professionals travel to your hotel suite in Palma de Mallorca. We bring all the necessary equipment to create the perfect environment: oils, aromas, music and everything needed for a complete experience.

faqs.question: Which hotels do you cover?
faqs.answer: We offer the service at any hotel in Palma de Mallorca and surrounding areas. You just need to provide us with the hotel address and room number when making the reservation.

faqs.question: How much advance notice do I need to book?
faqs.answer: For the Golden Suite Experience we recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance to guarantee availability and allow us to prepare all the details of your exclusive experience.

velvetDuet.title: VELVET DUET (COUPLE)
velvetDuet.meta_title: Velvet Duet Couple Palma | Couples Massage in Mallorca
velvetDuet.meta_description: Velvet Duet for couples in Palma de Mallorca. Shared experience of harmony and deep connection. Strengthens emotional and sensory bond. Wellness ritual for couples. Book now.
velvetDuet.meta_keywords: velvet duet couple palma, couples massage mallorca, couple experience palma, romantic massage mallorca, couple connection palma, massage for two palma, intimate couple experience mallorca
velvetDuet.description: Velvet Duet (Couple) is an experience designed to be shared, where two people immerse themselves together in an atmosphere of harmony, calm and deep connection. Through soft and enveloping massage techniques, delicate aromas and a carefully created atmosphere, the emotional and sensory bond between the couple is strengthened. It is a wellness ritual that invites complicity, synchronicity and conscious presence, allowing you to enjoy an intimate moment of relaxation, balance and union in perfect harmony.
velvetDuet.full_description: The Velvet Duet is a unique experience specially designed for couples seeking to reconnect, strengthen their bond and enjoy together a moment of deep well-being. This shared experience in Palma de Mallorca creates a sacred space where both members of the couple immerse themselves together in an atmosphere of harmony, calm and deep connection. The soft and enveloping massage techniques, combined with delicate aromas and a carefully designed atmosphere, facilitate synchronicity and conscious presence. It is a wellness ritual that invites complicity, strengthens the emotional and sensory bond, and allows you to enjoy an intimate moment of relaxation, balance and union in perfect harmony. Ideal for couples seeking to renew their connection or celebrate a special moment together.

faqs.question: How does the couples massage work?
faqs.answer: The Velvet Duet is designed so that both members of the couple enjoy the experience together. The techniques are applied so that both participate actively, strengthening their emotional and sensory bond in an atmosphere of harmony and complicity.

faqs.question: Do both need previous experience?
faqs.answer: Not necessary. The Velvet Duet is designed for all couples, regardless of their previous experience. Our professionals guide the experience adapting to the pace and needs of both.

faqs.question: Can it be a romantic experience?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The Velvet Duet is designed to create an intimate and romantic atmosphere that strengthens the connection between the couple. Perfect for special celebrations, anniversaries or simply to reconnect.
